Name: Kolpak-1S riot helmet
Description:
Kolpak-1S protects the head from the cold piercing-cutting weapons in a special class of protection GOST R50744-95, from fragmentation with an energy of impact up to 50 J, and also serves to reduce the dynamic loads arising from the above-mentioned means of destruction.

Protective helmets Kolpak-1 are recommended by the Interdepartmental Commission for equipping units of the patrol service, traffic police, OMON and other special units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia.
